title: Perfect Zero
description: In an attempt to break up a ring of human traffickers known as The Long Leash, Ezekiel Price goes undercover as an Owner to try to get close to the head of the ring and shut it down. Along the way, he picks up broken Assets and tries to rehabilitate them, without blowing his cover. Zeke picks up his first asset, a combat-trained operative called Zero, who's finished with killing. Zeke struggles to turn this former-killer into a sensual lover, while also trying to adjust to his role as an Owner.Words:54866 complete
author: Ryoko21
